text:
[Verse]
Raindrops on my window pane
Whispers of your name again
Footsteps fade into the night
Chasing shadows lost from sight

[Verse 2]
Puddles form where dreams collide
Underneath this moonlit sky
Silent echoes in the breeze
Love's a riddle no one sees

[Chorus]
Whispers in the rain
Calling out in vain
Searching for a sign
That you'll be mine

[Verse 3]
Stars above they paint the night
A canvas full of soft moonlight
I reach out but you're not there
My heart's a storm that you can't bear

[Bridge]
Distant thunder rolls away
Promises we couldn't say
Lightning strikes a fleeting spark
Lost together in the dark

[Chorus]
Whispers in the rain
Calling out in vain
Searching for a sign
That you'll be mine
title: Whispers in the Rain
